name: RelaxingMusic
0:
”Alexa, open relaxing music”
”Alexa, start relaxing music”
”Alexa, launch relaxing music”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: relaxing music
des: Relaxing Music plays a gentle, soft piano melody perfect for the spa or meditation. This is a great way to relax, meditate or fall asleep and will loop for endless hours of peaceful blissfulness.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
